field.name: summary
field.value: Add support to a base layout

field.name: description
field.value:
As described at http://forum.castleproject.org/viewtopic.php?p=43#43
"A base layout is applied everywhere. (wont be if you force :layout => false) In the views folder, theres also a layout folder. In there, by default, theres an application.rhtml. This files is applied everywhere. The exception is if force any other kind of layout.
So if you have a menu, you just dont need to inform it in every controller. Just put it in the base layout(application.rhtml) and you're done.
Then you draw the template in its child contents. "
